post.text: Join Hillary on the trail in North Carolina with Bernie Sanders and Pharrell Williams. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Carrie
comment.text: I am a lifelong democrat and I will never be proud to say she is our President. I did not vote for her, my mother did not vote for her and my father did not vote for her. It's such a shame the democrats have lost their way. I used to refer to myself as a dyed-in-the-wool democrat but not anymore. The democrats are total hypocrites now and an embarrassment to our country, both Hillary and Trump.

replies.author: Corbie
replies.text: What is your biggest concern with a Hillary presidency? For me it's foreign policy, but I still voted for her without reservation.

replies.author: Corbie
replies.text: I believe voting for a third party is important even though I couldn't do it myself. One day they'll have a real chance thanks to people like you.

replies.author: Carrie
replies.text: Wow Corbie that was the nicest thing has said to me during this political season, thank you for being such a gentleman.
